alert.note: Alert for Boone County Except Southwest; Marion (Arkansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 11 at 4:18PM CDT by NWS Little Rock
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northwestern Marion and northeastern Boone Counties through 445 PM CDT... At 418 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 8 miles northwest of Diamond City, or 10 miles southeast of Forsyth, moving southeast at 35 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Bull Shoals... Yellville... Flippin... Diamond City... Bergman... Lead Hill... Pyatt... Lakeway... Winington... Clark Hill... Dodd City... Willis... Crawford... Ozark Isle... Bull Shoals State Park... Cotter... Summit... Crumpler Subdivision... Zinc... South Lead Hill... MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. A Severe Thunderstorm Watch remains in effect until 1000 PM CDT for north central Arkansas.
